text:
[Verse]
Under neon lights where we meet
Eyes that shine so bright in the street
Laughter echoes through the night
Everything feels so right

[Verse 2]
Music pumping loud we just groove
Feel the rhythm can't help but move
Dancing under stars so high
Feels like we can touch the sky

[Chorus]
Under neon lights we are free
Lost in this electric city
Can't stop this energy
Just you and me under neon lights

[Bridge]
Heartbeat syncing with the beat
In this moment time feels sweet
Colors blur and time fades out
In the night we have no doubt

[Verse 3]
Whispers carried on the breeze
Every move a masterpiece
Catch our breath we laugh and spin
Can't wait for this to begin

[Chorus]
Under neon lights we are free
Lost in this electric city
Can't stop this energy
Just you and me under neon lights
title: Under Neon Lights
